attributes.action: END EMPLOYMENT AGENCIES TAKING LOW PAID WORKERS WAGES
attributes.additional_details: BUSINESS IN THE UK, USE EMPLOYMENT AGENCIES TO RECRUIT LABOUR, THE BUSINESS GIVES THE EMPLOYMENT AGENCY FOR EXAMPLE £12.50 PER HOUR, THE AGENCY THEN PASS ON £6.50P/H TO THE EMPLOYEE, LEAVING THE TAXPAYER TO SUBSIDISE LOW PAID WORKERS WITH WORKING TAX CREDITS, THIS ISSUE NEEDS URGENT ATTENTION IT NEEDS YOUR SUPPORT. THE TAX CREDIT BILL AMOUNTS TO BILLIONS PER WEEK,
